idea-plugin.name: Remote Repository Mapper
idea-plugin.description:
This is a really simple plugin that provides a convenient shortcut to open a git version controlled file in its origin repository. This can be useful if you need to share the code with someone or just get quick access to it in the remote repository.

After installing select your remote repository provider in Settings → Other Settings → Remote Repository Mapper (currently supports GitHub, Stash, BitBucket, GitLab). Make sure you have registered your project's root under the version control settings. Preferences â†’ Version Control (see unregistered roots)

To use, open a file that is under git version control in the editor and select File → Open in remote repository. Note that the current branch is used unless it does not exist in origin or does not track a remote branch in which case it defaults to master.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
